name: CHEM TRIALS
description:
Be a daredevil and fly your bi-plane over the hills and through towns.

Spread the mysterious substance around the planet!

But beware, the government is on your tail with some nasty assault helicopters!

Controls:

W A S D - movement

Esc - credits

BUGS:

The plane audio loop clips for some reason :(

Created during Ludum Dare #38, a 48 hour game jam.

April 22nd - 24th
